name: Sticky 'N' Stoned [Demo]
description:
Venture into a procedurally generated dungeon filled with monsters.  Use your wits and environment to progress. > CONTROLS:

WASD - Move

SHIFT - Dodge Roll

Left Click - Shoot Glue

E - Pickup Objects

Right Click - Throw Objects

> CREDITS:

⌨️Programming: 

Christo Staszewski & Andrew Stafford

🎵Music + Sound FX:

Wayne Uhlenhake 

🛠️Level Design:

Joshua Johannsen

👾Art: 

Matt Snyder
